title: Arclight Vel'koz Missing Tentacles
body:
I was spectating a game, and this Arclight Vel'koz was missing his tentacles.
Might not be in-game, but it his model was still there, just the tentacles were missing.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We've seen something like this happen in the past, and it was also in Spectator mode. We didn't have a repro for it originally, and were unable to find a root cause, but if it's still happening, we can certainly re-open the issue and dig a bit more to see if we can find out what's going on. This one's tricky 'cause his tentacles are particles, unlike his other skins, which makes him a special snowflake when it comes to bugs. :P
Would a video help in finding the cause of the bug? I actually encountered that issue myself while playing Vel'koz.
If you have one, that'd be great!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/7T8Iv3FQ-gameplay-velkoz-tentacles-disappear-until-death 

There's a description I put there with the video describing what happened to Vel'Koz (me) before they disappeared!
